name: Kimberly Hasty
text: Always friendly. Great food, orders are always right. I really appreciate having you in our little parish! Highly recommended.

name: Me'Brian Williams
text: Ignorant,annoyed manager..the other worker was sweet. We called them twice and been on hold for the longest both times. Two stars for the pizza though

name: Patty The Avon Lady
text: One of the employees told me I didn't put my name on my order and argued with me after I told here I signed into my account to order and on top of that, they got my order jacked up and I ended up waiting 30 minutes to get it! I hate this place and I can't wait until the one in front of Walmart on Bert Kouns opens back up!

name: Debra Cox
text: Horrible!!  Pizza were cold barely any sauce  on either pizzas. I order 2 medium 1 hand toss pepperoni and 1 pan meatlovers. They're out of pan dough so end up with hand toss meat lovers. Both pizza's had less than tablespoon of pizza sauce â€¦More

name: Dr Dottie L Lewis
text: One waitress seemed annoyed, we were charged for warm soda..there was no ice. But, the pizza was good.
